name: Velwell House Bed & Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for two nights and wished it had been longer! Val and Gareth are both welcoming and interesting, Val is an artist and this shows in every aspect of the house. Velwell House is in the most amazing location with lovely views over the surrounding countryside.
reviews.title: Tranquil, beautiful and a privilege to stay there!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our stunning room was both spacious and comfortable, the food delicious both "welcome cake" and breakfasts with homemade breads, jams, yogurt and pancakes.
reviews.title: A mini-boutique hotel?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Val couldn't have been more helpful, suggesting and booking restaurants and great places to visit. This is definitely the most wonderful place to stay and I would thoroughly recommend it.
reviews.title: Peace and tranquility!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a week here in early August, and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. As the earlier reviews have consistently said, great welcome, beautiful room, superb breakfasts, very high standard of finish and decor everywhere, wonderful setting, exceptionally friendly and helpful hosts.
reviews.title: Jon and Lou

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011
reviews.text: This is really much more than 'B&B' usually implies - more like a mini-boutique hotel - and we would thoroughly recommend it in every respect.
reviews.title: Superb. Velwell is so much more than just a B&B. Bring a little happiness to your world and stay here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013
reviews.text: I wish I could of written this sooner but I went to Istanbul after leaving Devon.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now VelWell House is just amazing and Val was the perfect host. We booked this venue as we were attending a wedding.
reviews.title: Uplifting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: We arrived on Friday 24th May in the afternoon and we were greeted by Val and shown around the beautiful house. Our bed room was massive and the king size bed was so comfortable. The room is spot less and the walk in shower is excellent.
reviews.title: Superb! Superb! Superb!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013
reviews.text: Val gave us all the information we needed about the area and house. We were offered coffee and some lovely lemon drizzle cake (yum)
reviews.title: Hands down the best BnB iv been too!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now don't get me started about breakfast Val can cook up a storm it was the best English breakfast I've had in a long time.
reviews.title: John and Margaret

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just returned from a bank holiday trip with my boyfriend - the house is stunning, with beautiful views over the Devon countryside. Dartington and Totnes are just a few minutes drive away - perfect for visiting Devon. The rooms were clean and spacious and kept to a high standard. Val was very welcoming and went out of her way to make the weekend special - cupcakes and tea on arrival, fabulous home baked bread for breakfast in the morning. We will be back and will be recommending to friends and family.
reviews.title: Beautiful country house in perfect location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Close to Totnes, voted in top 10 best towns world wide, Val and Gareth offer B and B guests a luxurious stay , in their beautifully renovated Victorian house, with views over the Devon countryside. Breakfasts are generous, tasty and healthy, with home made bread and pastries, and vegetarian cooked options available. It is an ideal spot to explore Totnes and surrounding countryside, and perhaps further to Dartmore. Val is an artist and displays some of her work in the house. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Totnes based (8 minutes by car), this provides luxury B and B in a rural heaven.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our short stay was wonderful . Our only slight disappointment was not having a bath in which to wallow, but the shower was great.
reviews.title: Fabulous B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Probably the best B&B we have ever stayed in. A very warm welcome, lovely location, spacious rooms with superb attention to detail. Lovely breakfast. I cannot fault Velwell. The owners are very warm and welcoming. We will definately be going back. Our experience was so much more than simply a B&B
reviews.title: One of the best bed and breakfasts we have ever stayed at.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were welcomed at Velwell House with tea and home-made cake, and straight away we felt at home. Everywhere was so peaceful and quiet.
reviews.title: A little off the beaten track, a haven of calm and comfort.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in this beautiful part of South Devon and were delighted by our choice of B&B. We were warmly welcomed by Val and accommodated in a spacious, tastefully decorated and extremely clean en-suite room with great views of the stunning countryside . The breakfasts were a marvellous feast, with emphasis on home made and locally sourced organic produce. Val was a most generous hostess and we loved our stay there.
reviews.title: B&B perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: As a family of 4 adults we had a four night stay at Velwell House Gareth & Val were excellent hosts sharing their very special home. Perfection in every way Hospitality, location, rooms and the most wonderful home made food served at breakfast, an incredibly hard act to follow in the future. Absoloutly faultless would thoroughly recommend.
reviews.title: Amazing absoloute perfection in every way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have recently returned from a short stay at Velwell House and wanted to reiterate the views of all the previous posters. Trip Advisor is our first port of call when chosing a bed and breakfast and as usual we were not let down. Velwell House deserves all the top reviews.
reviews.title: A perfect country retreat.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location wise- if you are looking for a quiet spot out in the country this is a good choice. No traffic noise here! The house is set on a hill with spectacular views over towards Dartmoor. You'll need a car unless you are a serious walker.
reviews.title: What a fantastic B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The area itself is beautiful - plenty of very pretty villages to explore, seaside close at hand and a short drive to the wilds of Dartmoor with the ponies and craggy moors. Nearby Buckfast Abbey is well worth a trip as is the local town of Totnes.
reviews.title: Velwell House- this is what B&B should always be. Fabulous.

aka: Velwell House Bed & Breakfast Dartington, Devon - Totnes
description: A spacious and luxurious Victorian country house with a contemporary atmosphere and magnificent Dartmoor views. Velwell House is conveniently placed for the A38 but close to Dartington Hall and Totnes. Boutique hotel style comfort at B and B prices.
